definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

pinyin: Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3

definition: Hengchun Peninsula in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], the southernmost point of Taiwan
Indochina (old term, esp. colonial period)/now written 中南半島|中南半岛[Zhong1 nan2 Ban4 dao3]
pinyin: Yin4 du4 zhi1 na4 Ban4 dao3

definition: the Antarctic Peninsula (jutting out towards South America)

sentences.english: He warned us about the serious situation of Byland Korea.
sentences.chinese: 他向我們談了朝鮮半島的嚴重形勢。

sentences.english: India from Deccan rivers up to Krishna river system.
sentences.chinese: 來自德干河的印度半島向上到克里希納河河流域。

sentences.english: Moreover, it is one of the locations opening to the outside world on the Liaodong Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 同時，它也是遼東半島對外開放的窗口之一。

sentences.english: Jiaozhou Bay, which is much smaller, is found to the south, next to Qingdao.
sentences.chinese: 而半島以南緊挨青島的膠州灣，則要小得多。

sentences.english: The city of Macao, coextensive with the peninsula, is the capital. Population, 350,000.
sentences.chinese: 佔據整個澳門半島的澳門城是該地首府。

sentences.english: This was the Bataan death march.
sentences.chinese: 這就是巴丹半島的死亡行軍。

sentences.english: The Macau Museum, which opened two years ago, offers an excellent introduction to the peninsula's5 past and present.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前開放的澳門博物館極好地展示了半島的和現在。

sentences.english: And there is yet another possibility that Isidore could head toward the Yucatan Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 還有一種可能就是颶風伊西多爾會侵襲尤卡坦半島。

sentences.english: Long Beach, the city rely on a peninsula connected with the Italian mainland.
sentences.chinese: 整個城市只靠一條長堤與意大利大陸半島連接。

sentences.english: a tapir found in Malaya and Sumatra.
sentences.chinese: 產於馬來半島和蘇門答臘島的貘。

sentences.english: Singapore is at the south most end of the railway network of the Malay Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡位於馬來半島鐵路網的最南端。

sentences.english: That wasn't a run it was a death march .
sentences.chinese: 這就是巴丹半島的死亡行軍。

sentences.english: China upholds and stays committed to peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 中方一貫主張並堅定致力於維護朝鮮半島和平與穩定。

sentences.english: South central Sweden is a thing is close to the sea the peninsula, middle high, both banks are low.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典中南部是一個東西瀕海的半島，中間高，兩岸低。

sentences.english: The fishery has always been an important prehistoric mode of subsistence in Liaodong Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 漁業始終是史前時期遼東半島重要生業之一。

sentences.english: He set up a claim to jurisdiction over Byland on the ground of affiliation.
sentences.chinese: 他以從屬關係爲理由提出對半島地區擁有管轄權。

definition: Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
